item.title: A Staggering Number Of Teens Personally Know Someone Targeted By Deepfake Nudes

item.title: New Data Shows Just How Badly OpenAI And Perplexity Are Screwing Over Publishers
item.description: AI companies promised publishers their AI search engines would send them more readers via referral traffic. New data shows that’s not the case.
